name: Barbar-chicks
description:
Defend the King! The Barbar-chicks are coming!!! 

The end may be inevitable, but the Knights are not going down without a fight. 

A puzzle game where you have to defend the king from the horde as long as you can.

Created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 50. 

Programming by Tan Kang Soon , Art by Lois Chng 

Music Credits: 

Trouble With Tribals by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/6427-trouble-with-tribals
